Description
Feel like M. Bison from Street Fighter IV with this alternate suit top! Combine it with the suit bottom to become the true leader of Shadaloo! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

Prenez-vous pour M. Bison de Street Fighter IV avec ce haut de costume alternatif ! Essayez-le avec le bas correspondant pour devenir le leader de Shadaloo ! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

Fühle dich mit diesem alternativen oberen Teil eines Anzuges wie M. Bison aus Street Fighter IV! Kombiniere es mit dem passenden unteren Teil und werde zum wahren Anführer von Shadaloo! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Diventa M. Bison di Street Fighter IV con la parte sopra di questo costume alternativo! Abbinala al sotto per diventare il vero leader di Shadaloo! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

¡Ponte este traje alternativo (p. superior) y siéntete como M. Bison de Street Fighter IV! ¡Combínalo con la parte inferior y conviértete en el líder de Shadaloo! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
ストリートファイター4 ベガになりきることができるアレンジ ver.のスーツ （上） 上下あわせてあなたもベガ気分 Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 바이슨이 되는 어렌지 ver. 슈트(상의). 상, 하의를 맞추면 당신도 바이슨. Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Feel like M. Bison from Street Fighter IV with this alternate suit top! Combine it with the suit bottom to become the true leader of Shadaloo! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 可以化身為M. Bison的服裝 (上)之特別版！上下合起來讓你擁有M. Bison的感覺。Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 可以化身為M. Bison的服裝 (上)之特別版！上下合起來讓你擁有M. Bison的感覺。Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
